meanings.definition: Not based on tradition or custom.
meanings.sent1: The untraditional recipe used new ingredients.
meanings.sent2: Her untraditional outfit stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The untraditional way he tied his shoes made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His untraditional approach to problem-solving was surprisingly effective.
meanings.sent5: The untraditional painting was a bold departure from the norm.

meanings.definition: Departing from or not conforming to tradition.
meanings.sent1: Their untraditional wedding ceremony was unique and memorable.
meanings.sent2: The untraditional decision raised eyebrows among the group.
meanings.sent3: She took an untraditional route to work and discovered a new cafe.
meanings.sent4: The untraditional twist in the plot kept the audience engaged.
meanings.sent5: The untraditional dance performance was a refreshing change.
